title: My.Little.Pony.Friendship.is.Magic.S04E02.WEB-DL.x264.AAC
description:
My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic - Season 4 - Episode 2 (WEB-DL - MP4)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Twilight Sparkle may be the smartest unicorn in Equestria, but there's more to life
than learning magic. So Princess Celestia sends her to Ponyville on a mission to
make friends. There, she meets Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Applejack, Rarity,
and Fluttershy. In all their exciting adventures together, the ponies
learn important lessons about friendship, as they discover that
friendship is the most powerful magic of all.

Produced by DHX Media, Studio B Productions, Top Draw Animation and Hasbro Studios.

 <a href="
http://imageshack.us/a/img18/6014/ei6a.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imageshack.us/a/img18/6014/ei6a.png</a>

The Everfree Forest is threatening to take over all of Equestria.
In order to stop it, Princess Twilight and her friends must bring
their Elements to the Tree of Harmony.
